direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve sending UDP messages and logging them, though one is more general and the other is specific to STUN packets.
Both methods involve sending messages and logging them, though one is specific to STUN indications.
Both methods involve sending responses and logging them, though one is specific to STUN responses.
Both methods involve sending requests and logging them, though one is specific to STUN requests.
Both methods involve sending channel data and logging them, though one is specific to STUN channel data.
